description: This is a Streamlit application script for a chess game where AI agents play against each other with roles such as White Player, Black Player, and Game Master. It manages game state, user interface, move validation, and AI interactions.

classes.name: ChessBoard
classes.description: Represents the chessboard state and provides methods for move validation, state retrieval, and game status.

methods.name: get_legal_moves_with_descriptions
methods.description: Generates a list of all legal moves from the current board state, including descriptions for UI display.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main function that runs the Streamlit app, manages game flow, user interface, and AI interactions.
